mapper.insert:
SELECT PK_TB_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_NO, USER_NO, STORE_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_TIME, PERSON_COUNT, RESERVATION_STATUS, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{reservationNo}, #{userNo}, #{storeNo}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{personCount}, #{reservationStatus}, SYSDATE )
